bodydiv.p: Any alleged breaches of due process will be considered within the context of the DPOC’s ongoing oversight of the Board’s and the Interpretations Committee’s due process. Alleged breaches could be raised by external parties (including media reports), internal parties, the DPOC or other Trustees. All parties are encouraged to raise any concerns as soon as they perceive that an alleged breach of due process has occurred.
